origination.corpname: Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.). Collector of Taxes and Assessments

did.abstract: The collection contains ledgers of the Brooklyn, N.Y. Collector of Gas Lamp Taxes and Assessments for several streets in the Bushwick neightborhood of Brooklyn, N.Y. Ledger entries include ward block map page number, block number, property owner's name, and remarks on payments.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder with no particular arrangement.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); City of Brooklyn Collector of Gas Lamp Tax Assessment ledgers, 1986.010, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains ledgers of the Brooklyn, N.Y. Collector of Gas Lamp Taxes and Assessments for several streets in the Bushwick neightborhood of Brooklyn, N.Y. Ledger entries include ward block map page number, block number, property owner's name, and remarks on payments.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials in this collection are in the public domain.
